body: Confederate Commanders            Major General Earl Van Dorn Commander, Army of the West           Major General Sterling Price Commander, Price's Division (Missouri State Guard),  Army of the West           Brigadier General Benjamin McCulloch Commander, McCulloch's Division, Army of the West           Brigadier General James McIntosh Commander, McIntosh's Cavalry Brigade           Brigadier General Albert Pike Commander, Pike's Indian Brigade           Colonel Louis Hebert Commander, Hebert's Infantry Brigade           Colonel Stand Watie Commander, 2nd Cherokee Mounted Rifles
title: Pea Ridge National Military Park: Confederate Commanders
